Title:
Identification of Alternaria tenuissima Causing Leaf Spot on
Yellow Ginger (Dioscorea zingiberensis) in Jiangsu Province, China
Keywords:
Alternaria tenuissima, Dioscorea zingiberensis,
identification, phylogenetic analysis
Abstract:
It is the first report of Alternaria tenuissima causing
leaf spot on yellow ginger (Dioscorea zingiberensis) in Jiangsu
province, China. To identify the pathogen, molecular and morphological
identification data of the total four isolates were obtained and a
multiple-gene phylogenetic tree was built based on three genes ribosomal
internal transcribed spacer (ITS), Plasma membrane ATPase (ATP) and
Calmodulin (CAL). KochÂ’s postulates were fulfilled with the
isolates.
